Action: # Article XML Upload: DOAJ XML
article_xml_upload/doaj_xml
## Try uploading without providing a file
Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area" /publisher/uploadfile
Do not fill in any inputs
Click "Upload"

Expected Test Results: Under the Select a file input and Upload from a link input an error "You must specify the file or upload from a link" error is displayed

Action: ## Upload a file which is not XML
Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area" /publisher/uploadfile
Select "Choose file" and select a file from your computer which is not text based (e.g. an image file or a PDF)
Click "Upload"

Expected Test Results: A flash message with appropriate text appears at the top of the screen, indicating an error has occurred

Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with the status "processing failed" and a suitable entry in the "Notes". Check that the explanation link goes to a suitable reason and resolution for the problem.

Action: ## Upload an XML file which does not meet the DOAJ schema
Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"

Select "Choose file" and select a file from your computer which is XML but not of the DOAJ schema. You may use the file "schema_invalid.xml" from the DOAJ folder in resources for this test.

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4158_update_encouragament/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/DOAJ/schema_invalid.xml
Choose "DOAJ Native XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown
Click "Upload"

Expected Test Results: A flash message with appropriate text appears at the top of the screen, indicating an error has occurred

Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with the status "processing failed" and a suitable entry in the "Notes" (you may need to reload the page). Check that the explanation link goes to a suitable reason and resolution for the problem.

Action: ## Upload a file with duplicates inside the file
Ensure that the publisher account owns a journal with Print ISSN "1111-1111" and E-ISSN "2222-2222", and these are not attached to any other journals
Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"
Choose "DOAJ Native XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown

Select "Choose file" and select the test resource file "duplicate_in_file.xml" from the DOAJ folder

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4158_update_encouragament/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/DOAJ/duplicate_in_file.xml
Click "Upload"

Expected Test Results: A flash message appears at the top of the screen: File uploaded and waiting to be processed. Check back here for updates.
Click away to another tab and then back - your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with the status "pending"

Action: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then click away and then back again. If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

Expected Test Results: Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with the status "processing failed" and a suitable entry in the "Notes".  Check that the explanation link goes to a suitable reason and resolution for the problem.

Action: ## Upload a file containing ISSNs the publisher does not own

Ensure that the ISSNs 0000-0002 and 0000-000X are in DOAJ attached to one or more journals (e.g. one with 0000-000X AND 0000-0002 or two, one with 0000-0002 and another with 0000-000X).  None of the journals with these ISSNs should be owned by the publisher
Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"
Choose "DOAJ Native XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown

Select "Choose file" and select the test resource file "unowned_issn.xml" from the DOAJ folder

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4158_update_encouragament/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/DOAJ/unowned_issn.xml
Click "Upload"

Expected Test Results: A flash message appears at the top of the screen indicating a successful upload: File uploaded and waiting to be processed. Check back here for updates. (Dismiss)
Click away to another tab and then back - your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "pending"

Action: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then click away and then back.  If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

Expected Test Results: Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "processing failed" and a suitable entry in the "Notes".  Check that the explanation link goes to a suitable reason and resolution for the problem.

Action: click on "(show error details)" for the record in the "History of uploads"

Expected Test Results: Clicking 'show error details' shows information indicating that the publisher does not own ISSNs "0000-0000" and "0000-000X"

Action: ## Successfully upload a file containing a new article

Ensure that the publisher account owns a journal with Print ISSN "1111-1111" and E-ISSN "2222-2222", and these are not attached to any other journals and that these journal does not contain "Success" or "Update" articles from previous tests.
Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"
Choose "DOAJ Native XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown

Select "Choose file" and select the test resource file "successful.xml"  from the DOAJ folder

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4158_update_encouragament/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/DOAJ/successful.xml
Click "Upload"

Expected Test Results: A flash message appears at the top of the screen, indicating a successful upload File uploaded and waiting to be processed. Check back here for updates.(Dismiss)
Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with the status "pending"

Action: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then reload the page (do not re-submit the form data).  If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

Action: Go to the Table of Contents for the journal (e.g. by going to /toc/2222-2222)

Expected Test Results: The list of articles should contain an article with the title "Success!"
